name: Kasongo Water Lord
shortLoreBlurb: Kasongo Water Lord is a spirit from DRC (Kasongo) associated with river bargains, fish. Appeased for safe passage and rains.

description: Kasongo Water Lord is a spirit from DRC (Kasongo) associated with river bargains, fish. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
